quests.title: Weapon Upgrade
quests.description:
Upgrade a weapon!
Upgrading a weapon improves its stats and makes it more powerful.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Upgrade any weapon after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Max Weapon Upgrade
quests.description:
Upgrade a weapon to max!
Upgrading a weapon to max allows you to combine it.
You'll need an identical weapon to combine it with, though.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Upgrade any weapon to max level after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Armor Upgrade
quests.description:
Upgrade a piece of armor!
Upgrading armor improves its stats and makes it more powerful.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Upgrade any armor after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Max Armor Upgrade
quests.description:
Upgrade a piece of armor to max!
Upgrading armor to max allows you to combine it.
You'll need an identical piece of armor to combine it with, though.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Upgrade any armor to max level after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Combine Weapon
quests.description:
Combine a weapon!
Combining a weapon raises its max upgrade level, allowing you to upgrade it further.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Combine any weapon after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Accessorize
quests.hint_msg: Check the rewards pages of the available events, find one with an accessory you want, and complete the event!
quests.description:
Get an accessory!
Accessories can confer all sorts of bonuses to characters, like raising stats or giving resistance to debuffs.
Accessories are usually obtained as rewards during events.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Acquire 1 or more accessories after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Complete Mako Reactor No. 5 (VII)
quests.hint_msg:
Air Buster is the boss of the Mako Reactor No. 5 dungeon (VII).
Exploit Air Buster's weakness to lightning to deal extra damage!
quests.description:
Complete Mako Reactor No. 5 in the FINAL FANTASY VII realm!
Completing Classic dungeons earns you Mythril and Stamina Shards.
Use 5 Mythril to get rare equipment from a Relic Draw.
Collect 5 Stamina Shards to raise your maximum Stamina by 1.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Complete the Mako Reactor No. 5 dungeon in the FINAL FANTASY VII realm after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Level 10 Character (FINAL FANTASY I)
quests.description:
Raise a character from FINAL FANTASY I to level 10!
The Warrior of Light is a character from FINAL FANTASY I.
Recruit the Warrior of Light by completing the Cavern of Earth 1 dungeon (I).
When fighting in dungeons from their native realm, characters get a Record Synergy bonus.
The Record Synergy bonus boosts characters' stats and the EXP they earn.
Recruit characters from each realm to have the perfect party ready at a moment's notice!
quests.achieve_cond_description: Raise any character from the FINAL FANTASY I realm to level 10 or higher.

quests.title: Level 10 Character (FINAL FANTASY II)
quests.description:
Raise a character from FINAL FANTASY II to level 10!
Josef and Gordon are characters from FINAL FANTASY II.
Recruit Josef by completing the Snow Cavern dungeon (II), and recruit Gordon by completing the Dreadnought dungeon (II).
Other characters can be recruited in different ways, such as completing events.
When fighting in dungeons from their native realm, characters get a Record Synergy bonus.
The Record Synergy bonus boosts characters' stats and the EXP they earn.
Recruit characters from each realm to have the perfect party ready at a moment's notice!
quests.achieve_cond_description: Raise any character from the FINAL FANTASY II realm to level 10 or higher.

quests.title: Level 10 Character (FINAL FANTASY III)
quests.description:
Raise a character from FINAL FANTASY III to level 10!
Luneth and Refia are characters from FINAL FANTASY III.
Recruit Luneth by completing the Altar Cave dungeon (III), and recruit Refia by completing the Molten Cave dungeon (III).
Other characters can be recruited in different ways, such as completing events.
When fighting in dungeons from their native realm, characters get a Record Synergy bonus.
The Record Synergy bonus boosts characters' stats and the EXP they earn.
Recruit characters from each realm to have the perfect party ready at a moment's notice!
quests.achieve_cond_description: Raise any character from the FINAL FANTASY III realm to level 10 or higher.

quests.title: Level  Character 10 (FINAL FANTASY IV)
quests.description:

Recruit Kain by completing the Mist Cave dungeon (IV), and recruit Rydia by completing the Fabul Castle dungeon (IV).

When fighting in dungeons from their native realm, characters get a Record Synergy bonus.
The Record Synergy bonus boosts characters' stats and the EXP they earn.
Recruit characters from each realm to have the perfect party ready at a moment's notice!
quests.achieve_cond_description: Raise any character from the FINAL FANTASY IV realm to level 10 or higher.

quests.achieve_cond_description: Raise any character from the FINAL FANTASY V realm to level 10 or higher.

When fighting in dungeons from their native realm, characters get a Record Synergy bonus.
The Record Synergy bonus boosts characters' stats and the EXP they earn.
Recruit characters from each realm to have the perfect party ready at a moment's notice!
quests.achieve_cond_description: Raise any character from the FINAL FANTASY VI realm to level 10 or higher.

When fighting in dungeons from their native realm, characters get a Record Synergy bonus.

quests.title: Create Blizzard (Black Magic Ability)
quests.description:
Create the black magic ability Blizzard!
Blizzard is an ice spell, so use it against enemies vulnerable to ice.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the black magic ability Blizzard after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Create Fira (Black Magic Ability)
quests.description:
Create the black magic ability Fira!
Fira is a more powerful version of Fire, so use it against enemies vulnerable to fire.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the black magic ability Fira after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Create Blizzara (Black Magic Ability)
quests.description:
Create the black magic ability Blizzara!
Blizzara is a more powerful version of Blizzard, so use it against enemies vulnerable to ice.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the black magic ability Blizzara after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Create Thundara (Black Magic Ability)
quests.description:
Create the black magic ability Thundara!
Thundara is a more powerful version of Thunder, so use it against enemies vulnerable to lightning.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the black magic ability Thundara after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Create Vox (White Magic Ability)
quests.description:
Create the white magic ability Vox!
Vox removes Silence from an ally.
Silenced allies can't use any magic, so use Vox to restore their spellcasting ability.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the white magic ability Vox after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Create Blindna (White Magic Ability)
quests.description:
Create the white magic ability Blindna!
Blindna removes Blind from an ally.
Blinded allies have a reduced chance to hit with their attacks, so use Blindna to restore their battle effectiveness.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the white magic ability Blindna after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Create Boost (Physical Ability)
quests.description:
Create the physical ability Boost!
Boost temporarily raises the Attack of an ally.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the physical ability Boost after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Create Double Cut (Physical Ability)
quests.description:
Create the physical ability Double Cut!
Double Cut is a powerful ability that deals 2 successive attacks on an enemy.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the physical ability Double Cut after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Create Salve (Physical Ability)
quests.description:
Create the physical ability Salve!
Salve restores HP to the user.
Salve is a convenient ability that your front-line characters can use to heal themselves in a pinch.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the physical ability Salve after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Create Dragon (Summon Ability)
quests.description:
Create the summon ability Dragon!
Summon a Dragon that deals non-elemental damage to all enemies.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the summon ability Dragon after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Create Jump (Dragoon Ability)
quests.description:
Create the dragoon ability Jump!
Jump sends the user into the air for a short time before landing and dealing damage to an enemy.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Create the dragoon ability Jump after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Hone Blizzard (Black Magic Ability)
quests.description:
Hone the black magic ability Blizzard!
Honing an ability increases the number of times you can use it.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Hone the black magic ability Blizzard after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Hone Thundara Strike (Spellblade Ability)
quests.description:
Hone the spellblade ability Thundara Strike!
Honing an ability increases the number of times you can use it.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Hone the spellblade ability Thundara Strike after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Hone Revive (Physical Ability)
quests.description:
Hone the physical ability Revive!
Honing an ability increases the number of times you can use it.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Hone the physical ability Revive after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Hone Chi Blast (Monk Ability)
quests.description:
Hone the monk ability Chi Blast!
Honing an ability increases the number of times you can use it.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Hone the monk ability Chi Blast after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Hone Chakra (Monk Ability)
quests.description:
Hone the monk ability Chakra!
Honing an ability increases the number of times you can use it.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Hone the monk ability Chakra after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Hone Pressure Point (Monk Ability)
quests.description:
Hone the monk ability Pressure Point!
Honing an ability increases the number of times you can use it.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Hone the monk ability Pressure Point after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Hone Launch (Physical Ability)
quests.description:
Hone the physical ability Launch!
Honing an ability increases the number of times you can use it.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Hone the physical ability Launch after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Use a Common Relic Draw
quests.description:
Use a Common Relic Draw!
You get 1 free Common Relic Draw per day.
It's possible for rare equipment to drop, so don't miss your chance!
quests.achieve_cond_description: Use a Common Relic Draw after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Use a Rare Relic Draw
quests.description:
Use a Rare Relic Draw!
Rare Relic Draws cost 5 Mythril or Gems.
Rare Relic Draws always drop 3★ or higher equipment, so give it a try!
quests.achieve_cond_description: Use a Rare Relic Draw after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Complete S.S. Liki Elite (X)
quests.hint_msg:
Sinspawn Echuilles is the boss of the S.S. Liki dungeon (X).
Sinspawn Echuilles is vulnerable to the Blind debuff.
Blinding Sinspawn Echuilles makes it much easier to avoid its powerful Drain Touch attack!
quests.description:
Restore Tidus's Hero Record and recruit him to your party!
Fulfill the Bonus Quest by completing the S.S. Liki Elite dungeon (X) to add Tidus to your roster.
If you already have Tidus's Hero Record, you'll get a Growth Egg instead.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Complete the S.S. Liki Elite dungeon in the FINAL FANTASY X realm after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Complete North Mountain Elite (V)
quests.hint_msg:
Magissa and Forza are the bosses of the North Mountain dungeon (V).
Magissa is vulnerable to Silence, and Forza is vulnerable to Sleep.
Use Silence and Sleep to shut down their magic and physical attacks!
quests.description:
Restore Lenna's Hero Record and recruit her to your party!
Fulfill the Bonus Quest by completing the North Mountain Elite dungeon (V) to add Lenna to your roster.
If you already have Lenna's Hero Record, you'll get a Growth Egg instead.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Complete the North Mountain Elite dungeon in the FINAL FANTASY V realm after accepting the quest.

quests.title: Complete Midgar Highway Elite (VII)
quests.hint_msg:
Motor Ball is the boss of the Midgar Highway dungeon (VII).
Motor Ball uses multi-target attacks one after another. Exploit its weakness to lightning to bring it down fast!
quests.description:
Restore Sephiroth's Hero Record and recruit him to your party!
Fulfill the Bonus Quest by completing the Midgar Highway Elite dungeon (VII) to add Sephiroth to your roster.
If you already have Sephiroth's Hero Record, you'll get a Growth Egg instead.
quests.achieve_cond_description: Complete the Midgar Highway Elite dungeon in the FINAL FANTASY VII realm after accepting the quest.
